38 Kevin Spacey, the actor, once a passenger on Jeffrey Epstein’s plane broke down in tears sharing his story of visiting Israel, deeply moved by citizens who have been the real victims for the past few years. posted 11 hours ago by CatalystForChange 6 comments award share report block Shadow of Ezra @ShadowofEzra • 11h Kevin Spacey broke down in tears while sharing his story about visiting Israel, saying he was deeply moved by citizens who he says have been the real victims for the past few years. The actor, once a passenger on Jeffrey Epstein’s plane, said he didn’t need to understand Hebrew
